import Image from "next/image" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import Link from "next/link" export default function AboutPage() { return (

Our Company

About Us

Welcome to Our Company. We are a passionate team dedicated to creating innovative solutions that make a difference in people's lives. Founded in 2023, we've been on a mission to revolutionize the tech industry with our cutting-edge products and services.

Our team of experts brings together years of experience and a shared vision for the future. We believe in the power of technology to solve complex problems and improve everyday life.

Our Mission

Our mission is to empower businesses and individuals with technology that enhances productivity, fosters creativity, and drives growth. We believe in the power of innovation to create a better future for all.

Through continuous research and development, we strive to push the boundaries of what's possible, always keeping our customers' needs at the forefront of our innovations.

Our Team

{[ { name: "Jane Doe", role: "CEO", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=200" }, { name: "John Smith", role: "CTO", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=200" }, { name: "Emily Brown", role: "Lead Designer", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=200" }, ].map((member) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

))}

Contact Us

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our products, need technical support, or want to explore partnership opportunities, our team is here to help.

© 2023 Our Company. All rights reserved.

) }
